participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and supportive, enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_1.background: I like playing badminton. I am not very good at playing basketball. I once rescued a baby on a highway. I don't really like vegetables or fruit but I pretend.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and passionate, driven to achieve goals and eager to help others.
participant_2.background: I'm headed to university of Michigan in the fall. I want to be a doctor when I graduate. I love tacos but hate spaghetti. My favorite season is summer. I just graduated high school.

content.text: What are you doing this summer before you head to college?
I'm going to work at a local grocery store, and I'm also going to be taking some summer classes.
That sounds like a lot of fun!
It is, but I'm also really excited to start college in the fall.
What are you going to study?
I'm going to be pre-med, and I want to be a doctor when I graduate.
Wow, that's really ambitious. I'm sure you'll do great!
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what are your favorite things to do?
I love to play sports, and I also love to read.
Me too! What's your favorite sport to play?
I love to play soccer, but I'm also really good at badminton.
That's awesome! I've never played badminton before.
You should try it! It's really fun.
I might just do that.
I'm sure you'd be a natural at it.
Thanks, I hope so!
So, what are your favorite books?
I love to read fantasy and science fiction books.
Me too! I love the Harry Potter series and the Lord of the Rings series.
Me too! I've read both series multiple times.
They're so good! I'm also a big fan of the Hunger Games series and the Divergent series.
Me too! I've read both of those series, too.
We have a lot in common! I'm sure we'll be great friends.
I think so too!
